Manager of Credit Advisory and Valuations Algorithmics June 2009  –  November 2011  (2 years 6 months) Greater New York City Area Developed, maintained, and used home-grown MBS bond valuation software along with our team’s proprietary MBS credit model to price bonds on a quarterly basis for a multitude of US banks. 
 
• Leveraged my programming skills to write an MBS bond pricing engine which generated structured cashflows using Intex/C++ and Intex/VBA based on collateral detail. 
• Maintained the team’s proprietary MBS credit model and kept it market calibrated.

• Worked closely with quants to manage development of the ratings agency’s key MBS credit engine, licensed to clients and used by the agency, to determine MBS bond ratings. The engine was about 2 million lines of code of Java and scripting.

• Implemented a mortgage insurance model in Excel/VBA used in MBS bond credit rating determination.
